main.name: Duo Han (Stephen)
main.description: I am a graduate of the Chinese University of Hong Kong, holding a degree in Electronic Information Engineering. Currently, an Embedded R&D Engineer in Beijing Haawking Technology Co., Ltd. My primary responsibilities include RTOS porting, embedded AI, and development related to Flash interfaces. With a strong foundation in embedded systems and a keen interest in advancing technology within the industry, I continuously seek to apply my technical expertise and innovative thinking to solve complex challenges in my field. Thanks for stopping by!
main.bio: Embedded R&D Engineer - C/C++, RISC-V, RTOS, FlashApi, Embedded AI, Firmware

resume.skillmessage: Here is the skill set I gained throughout my development years.

work.title: Embedded R&D Engineer
work.description:
•	Developed and trained a Neural Network for Arc Fault Detection, achieving 99% accuracy on HX2000 chips.•	Port the RTOS (UCOSii, LiteOS, PandaOS) to HX2000 series RISCV DSP chips and performed test case adaptation. 
•	Designed FlashAPI drivers for HX2000 chips, enabling flexible erase, write, DCSM, and ECC error correction functionalities.
•	Conducted comprehensive case design, RTL simulation, and chip testing for HX2000 series firmware, peripherals, boot processes, mass production tests, patches, and CMAC encryption algorithms.

work.title: Embedded Software Engineer (Intern)
work.description:
•	Compiled builderoot, and porting bootloader and Linux kernel to RISC-v (ux607) development board
•	Tested and analyzed the performance of AI algorithms that running on the RISC-V chip
•	Participated in Wall`E robot project. Designed a program that allows Wall’E to follow the registered face

work.title: Embedded Engineer (Intern)
work.description: •	Developing millimeter wave radars, including IWR6843AOP and AWR1642boost millimeter wave sensors

projects.title: Image Painting Style Transfer Website
projects.category: Researched multiple Image2Image Translation algorithms, applied Cycle-Consistent Adversarial Networks (CycleGAN) to achieve style transfer;

projects.title: Online Gomoku (five-in-a-row) Game
projects.category: Applied Mini-Max searching tree & Alpha-beta pruning algorithm to achieve human-machine match

projects.title: Research on Simple Circuit Characteristic Analyzer Project
projects.category: Implemented DDS and ADC to achieve the measurement of input and output resistance and amplifier gain, Applied a frequency sweep algorithm to measure the amplitude-frequency curve of circuit

maxims.text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll know when you find it.
